mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (username, name, phone, password, user_type, status, create_time) values (#{username}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{userType}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select * from sys_user
and username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
and phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and status = #{status}
order by create_time desc
